subject: Fix login bugs and improve backup UX
body:
- Fix AccountsStore double-init causing duplicate accounts
- Fix MobX warnings by wrapping SDK events in runInAction
- Fix login redirect loop (check authStore.status before redirect)
- Add backup check for users without deviceId (recovery flow)
- Improve backup skip UX with two-click confirmation
- Add step-by-step logging for MPC key generation
- Update docs: correct Phase 2 status (blockers were resolved)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
